author: Ben Brown
title: Dow Futures Bounce as JP Morgan Signals All-Time Highs in 2020
description:
JP Morgan analysts predict a return to all-time highs at the end of the year, based on new research that shows sunlight can kill coronavirus spread.

content:
• Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) futures bounce back after two days of selling.
  • JP Morgan sees a return to all-time highs by the end of 2020.
